Place Content

# Place Content

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                          | Support     |
| ------------------------------ | ----------- |
| ```
place-content-center
```   | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
place-content-start
```    | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
place-content-end
```      | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
place-content-between
```  | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
place-content-around
```   | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
place-content-evenly
```   | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
place-content-baseline
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
place-content-stretch
```  | 🌐 Web only |
